original_title: Self Mastery: Solo BJJ Training Drills
overview: Pick up Professor John Danaher’s solo drills for BJJ success for FREE! BJJ Fanatics & Professor John Danaher are teaming up to give everyone a way to train.  This new 4-volume series is a gift for everyone who can only train at home because of the pandemic.  Hear the same advice John Danaher gives his world class fighters (like Gordon Ryan & Garry Tonon) on how to keep improving when you can’t get on the mat.  Learn the right ways to do these basic BJJ movements and how to craft the perfect home BJJ workout.  This series is 4-volumes of FREE instruction from the most in-demand grappling coach on Earth.  Know more. Win more.
tagline: Train at home with the most important body skill exercises that you can practice, as you start to focus on details that you didn’t even know existed before now.
title: Self Mastery: Solo BJJ Training Drills
